spear.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a pole with a sharp pointed blade at one end, used as a weapon in the past
spear.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a thin pointed stem of a plant
spear.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to push or throw a spear into something, especially in order to kill it
spear.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: to push a pointed object, usually a fork, into something, so that you can pick it up
